content.prompt: Which of the following best characterizes Western imperialist expansion in the late nineteenth century?

choices.label: Western fears of the spread of Japanese influence
Western investment to create self-sufficient economies in the new colonies
An unprecedented amount of territory colonized in a short period of time
The establishment of political institutions to resolve ethnic and religious conflicts within colonies
The decline of British and United States influence in international affairs

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
